name: mri_normalize
description: Normalize the white-matter, optionally based on control points. The input volume is converted into a new volume where white matter image values all range around 110.

inputs.name: Input Volume
inputs.description: Input MRI volume file

inputs.name: Output Volume
inputs.description: Output MRI volume file

inputs.name: 3D Normalization Iterations
inputs.description: Use n 3D normalization iterations (default=2)

inputs.name: Disable 1D Normalization
inputs.description: Disable 1D normalization

inputs.name: Non-Maximum Suppression
inputs.description: Turn non-maximum suppression on (1) or off (0) when using interior of surfaces

inputs.name: Conform Volume
inputs.description: Interpolate and embed volume to be 256^3

inputs.name: Non-Conform Volume
inputs.description: Do not conform the volume

inputs.name: Gentle Normalization
inputs.description: Perform kinder gentler normalization

inputs.name: Control Points File
inputs.description: Use control points file (usually control.dat)

inputs.name: Only Use Control Points File
inputs.description: Use only control points file

inputs.name: Only Use Labels
inputs.description: Use only control points in label file

inputs.name: Label File
inputs.description: Use control points in label file

inputs.name: Write Control Point and Bias Field Volumes
inputs.description: Write control point (c) and bias field (b) volumes

inputs.name: Control Point Intensity Above
inputs.description: Use control point with intensity above target (default=25.0)

inputs.name: Control Point Intensity Below
inputs.description: Use control point with intensity below target (default=10.0)

inputs.name: Max Intensity Gradient
inputs.description: Use max intensity/mm gradient (default=1.000)

inputs.name: Prune Control Points
inputs.description: Turn pruning of control points on/off (default=off)

inputs.name: No Gentle Control Points
inputs.description: Do not use gentle normalization with control points file

inputs.name: Mask File
inputs.description: Mask file to use

inputs.name: Atlas Transform
inputs.description: Use atlas to exclude control points from being in non-brain regions

inputs.name: No Skull
inputs.description: Do not consider skull regions

inputs.name: Monkey Mode
inputs.description: Turns off 1D, sets num_3d_iter=1

inputs.name: Disable SNR Normalization
inputs.description: Disable SNR normalization

inputs.name: Sigma Smooth
inputs.description: Smooth bias field with given sigma

inputs.name: Aseg File
inputs.description: Aseg file for processing

inputs.name: Debug Vectors
inputs.description: For debugging

inputs.name: Debug Gradients
inputs.description: For debugging

inputs.name: Renormalization Volume
inputs.description: Load volume and use all points in it that are exactly 110 as control points

inputs.name: Check Normalization
inputs.description: Load volume and remove all control points that aren't in [min max]

inputs.name: Read Control Points
inputs.description: For reading control points and bias field

inputs.name: Control Points Output Volume
inputs.description: Output final control points as a volume (only with -aseg)

inputs.name: Surface and Transform
inputs.description: Normalize based on the skeleton of the interior of the transformed surface

inputs.name: Random Seed Value
inputs.description: Set random number generator to seed N

inputs.name: Print Help
inputs.description: Print usage

output-files.description: Output final control points as a volume, applicable only with -aseg
output-files.name: Control Points Output Volume

author: FreeSurfer Developers
